enlist.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to persuade someone to help you to do something
enlist.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The public are being enlisted to help.
He has enlisted the help of a sports psychologist for the team.
enlist.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to join the army, navy etc
enlist.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: At the outbreak of war, he was enlisted in the army.
